oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Recordings - Hank Williams Sr. - yyyy-mm-dd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Songs recorded by Hank Williams Sr. mostly using just his voice and guitar. Most of these recordings are listed in the 1998 Mercury Records The Complete Hank Williams CD boxed set as the Shreveport radio performances plus the demos.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Tennessee Border (radio recording which includes middle section with overdubbed instruments) / (02:21) First Year Blues (radio recording) / (04:51) Rockin' Chair Money (radio recording) / (7:00) Swing Wide Your Gate Of Love (radio recording) / (09:27) Cool Water (radio recording) / (13:16) Roly Poly (radio recording) / (15:21) We Live In Two Different Worlds (demonstration recording) / (17:23) My Main Trial Is Yet To Come (radio recording with overdubbed instruments) / (19:31) Thank God (radio recording) / (21:59 ) The Old Home (radio recording with overdubbed instruments) / (24:45) Wait For The Light To Shine (radio recording) / (27:30) Sundown And Sorrow (radio recording with overdubbed instruments) / (28:57) I'm So Tired Of It All (demonstration recording) / (31:27) You Broke Your Own Heart (demonstration recording) / (33:06) Kaw-liga (demonstration recording with two false starts) / (36:20) I Could Never Be Ashamed Of You (demonstration recording) /

(38:46) You Caused It All By Telling Lies (radio recording) / (40:26) The Tramp On The Street (radio recording) / (44:14) The Angel Of Death (demonstration recording) / (46:40) The Angel Of Death (demonstration recording in different key) / (48:33) Dixie Cannonball (radio recording) /
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
